description: Here at Goonhammer, we know that it’s hard to keep track of all the news happening all the time in the games industry. So much is always going on with games of all sorts, and their related media, it can be a real blink-and-you’ll miss it situation.  That’s why every week, we round up five […]
title: Games Industry News Roundup- September 3rd, 2024

description: We take a look at the new Leagues of Votann Crusade rules in White Dwarf #503 - what's going on with them, are they any good, and how to use them.
title: Goonhammer Reviews: Index Leagues of Votann 10th Edition Crusade Rules in White Dwarf 503

description: The model for War Machine is one of the best sculpts that AMG has released for Marvel: Crisis Protocol.  I wish he played a little bit better in-game, but that didn’t decrease my excitement for painting the model once he arrived in the mail. Here’s how I did it. I primed the model in black, […]
title: How To Paint Everything: Marvel Crisis Protocol War Machine

description: Our Infinity crew sit down to talk about the revealed rules from the upcoming N5 release and what they mean for the game.
title: Infinity N5 Previews Discussion

description: In our How to Paint Everything series we look at how to paint well, everything, with different techniques and approaches. This week we’re looking at how to plan and execute a simple but striking paint scheme for massed troops in Conquest. Step 0 – Colour Scheme Planning Step 0 in painting, like the Laws of […]
title: How To Paint Everything: Conquest Sorcerer Kings Part 2
